alert.note: Alert for Albany; Rensselaer; Saratoga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 5:04AM EST until December 20 at 12:20PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Troy. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Water reaches streets in Waterford Village and Matsons Shipyard on Van Schaick Island. Some basements flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 23.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Troy Flood Stage: 21.5 Observed Stage at Tue 4 am: 23.3 Forecast: Tue 7 am 23.4 Tue 1 pm 23.5 Tue 7 pm 23.1 Wed 1 am 22.3 Wed 7 am 21.4 Wed 1 pm 20.7 Wed 7 pm 20.3 Thu 1 am 19.9 Thu 7 am 19.6 Thu 1 pm 19.4 Thu 7 pm 19.1 Fri 1 am 18.9 &&
